item.title: My Second Blog
item.description: This is just a trial blog to see if i need to run hugo again or just runing hugoserver make changes to public directory. Thanks

item.title: My First Blog
item.description: Introduction Hey, Yesterday I have decided to makemyown blog, so after going through various options ranging from CMS such as wordpress, wix to stuff like gatsby I have decided to use hugo.
item.content:
Introduction

Hey, Yesterday I have decided to makemyown blog, so after going through various options ranging from CMS such as wordpress, wix to stuff like gatsby I have decided to use hugo.
